thread.title: John Dingell just made a joke about Rep. John Lewis’ district in Atlanta and it’s HILARIOUS
thread.title_full: John Dingell just made a joke about Rep. John Lewis’ district in Atlanta and it’s HILARIOUS

author: Greg P.
title: John Dingell just made a joke about Rep. John Lewis’ district in Atlanta and it’s HILARIOUS
text:
John Dingell just made a joke about Rep. John Lewis’ district in Atlanta and it’s HILARIOUS Posted at 5:34 pm on January 22, 2017 by Greg P. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
As of the writing of this post, the Atlanta Falcons are crushing the Green Bay Packers 31-7 in the NFC Championship game being held in Atlanta, GA, which just happens to be the congressional district of Rep. John Lewis. A district which President Trump said: Congressman John Lewis should spend more time on fixing and helping his district, which is in horrible shape and falling apart (not to…… 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 14, 2017 mention crime infested) rather than falsely complaining about the election results. All talk, talk, talk – no action or results. Sad! 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 14, 2017 
Well, former Democratic Congressman John Dingell just tweeted this hilarious joke riffing off President Trump’s comments: When Trump tweeted about John Lewis's congressional district not being safe maybe he just forgot to @ the Green Bay Packers. 
— John Dingell (@JohnDingell) January 22, 2017 
LOL. Is this anyway to treat visitors to the city? Julio Jones ladies and gentlemen. #GBvsATL pic.twitter.com/pfBKj2Y52Z 
— Dylan (@DylansFreshTake) January 22, 2017 
Many others have been making variations of the same joke. Check it out: Trump's right, John Lewis' district is a mess. 53 men are getting the shit kicked out of them in downtown ATL and no one's doing anything.
